segments.text: Hello , Mary . Nice day , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , what a wonderful day ! The sky has cleared up in the end .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I do feel like an outdoor exercise . After all , we haven't had such a beautiful day for a long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about taking a walk in the park ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . It's delightful to have a walk in the park with the air so fresh .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( After they entering the park ) Great , it's so quiet here . We have the park to ourselves , only you and me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you kidding ? Don't you see many people over there ? Just on your right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see them . Beautiful weather should be shared by all the people .
segments.speaker: S2
